viewData.name: Samsung Q6FNA 55" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart Multi-System QLED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung Q6FNA 55" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart Multi-System QLED TV featuring Multi-System Compatible, UHD 3840 x 2160 LED Panel HDR10, HDR10+, HLG Support. Review Samsung Q6FN
viewData.long_description: View content at four times the resolution of 1080p across NTSC, PAL, and SECAM TV systems with the Samsung Q6FNA 55" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart Multi-System QLED TV. This TV has a 55" LED-backlit LCD panel, and incorporates Motion Rate 200 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. It is compatible with the HDR10, HDR10+, and HLG HDR formats to provide a wider color gamut with compatible content and other equipment for more vivid images. The Q6FNA has built-in Wi-Fi connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. With four HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. Two USB ports are also onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
